entry.tran: (正式或明确的口头或书面)陈述，声明
entry.def: A statement is something that you say or write which gives information in a formal or definite way.

example.ex: Andrew now disowns that statement, saying he was depressed when he made it...
example.tran: 安德鲁现在推翻了那个说法，说那是自己在情绪低落时说的话。

example.ex: 'Things are moving ahead.'— I found that statement vague and unclear.
example.tran: “事情正在取得进展。”——我认为这个说法含糊不清。

entry.tran: (为某一场合特别发表的)官方声明，正式声明
entry.def: A statement is an official or formal announcement that is issued on a particular occasion.

example.ex: The statement by the military denied any involvement in last night's attack.
example.tran: 军方发表声明称其和昨晚的袭击无任何关系。

entry.tran: (嫌疑人或证人向警方提供的)陈述，证词
entry.def: You can refer to the official account of events which a suspect or a witness gives to the police as a statement .

example.ex: The 350-page report was based on statements from witnesses to the events.
example.tran: 这份 350 页的报告是根据各位证人对这些事件的证词写成的。

entry.def: If you describe an action or thing as a statement, you mean that it clearly expresses a particular opinion or idea that you have.

example.ex: The following recipe is a statement of another kind—food is fun!
example.tran: 下面的食谱是另一种观点的表现——食物可以带来乐趣！

entry.def: A printed document showing how much money has been paid into and taken out of a bank or building society account is called a statement .

entry.tran: 证明(儿童)有特殊教育需求
entry.def: If a child is statemented, social services staff write a document stating that the child has special educational needs, and the local education authority has to make sure that everything that is necessary is provided for that child.

example.ex: Nearly a year later, it was agreed that Tom would be statemented...
example.tran: 近一年后，汤姆被批准将获得特殊教育。

example.ex: I had eight statemented children in my  class.
example.tran: 我的班里有 8 名需要接受特殊教育的孩子。

means.word_mean: 1. a message that is stated or declared; a communication (oral or written) setting forth particulars or facts etc;

sentences.sentence: "according to his statement he was in London on that day"

means.word_mean: 2. a fact or assertion offered as evidence that something is true;

sentences.sentence: "it was a strong argument that his hypothesis was true"

means.word_mean: 3. (music) the presentation of a musical theme;

sentences.sentence: "a Cadillac makes a statement about who you are"
"his tantrums are a statement of his need for attention"

means.word_mean: 5. the act of affirming or asserting or stating something
6. (computer science) a line of code written as part of a computer program
7. a document showing credits and debits
